Warren.Hazel Park Raceway: Hazel Park Raceway, located in Hazel Park, Michigan, is a horse race track offering live thoroughbred racing every Friday and Saturday night May through mid September and simulcast wagering 7 days a week all year long on thoroughbred and harness races from across the US and Canada. Admission and parking are free. During live racing, guests can get up close and personal with the horses trackside in front of the grandstands in a fun, festive atmosphere or from the comfort of the clubhouse dining room located on the first turn.
